title: Commercial Signs From Kampala
content:
Hi Everyone..

My first contribution to this wonderfull site.  
This is for anyone interested in hand rendered signage.  
Enjoy..

[http://kampala.jesperlarsen.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203111505/http:/kampala.jesperlarsen.com/ "http://kampala.jesperlarsen.com/")

author: Gregers™

comments.content:
I’ve got to know a bit about Kampala because of 2003 “My Kampala” project by Lincoln Kayiwa.  
Thanks for the link.
